about_the_game:
Throwdown even harder with the help of this Incredible Bundle.

This pack includes a ton of good loot for a great deal.

Contents:
  • 1700 Gems
  • 300 Giggitywatts
  • 3,500 Golden Turds

So unwrap some powerful new cards, upgrade them, and continue to battle in the world of Animation Throwdown!
detailed_description:
Throwdown even harder with the help of this Incredible Bundle.

This pack includes a ton of good loot for a great deal.

So unwrap some powerful new cards, upgrade them, and continue to battle in the world of Animation Throwdown!

fullgame.name: Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8 or greater
  • Processor: Core i5 or Core i7
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU required
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

name: Animation Throwdown - Incredible Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5 or Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 400 Series or Better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: The Incredible Bundle includes Gems, Giggitywatts, and Golden Turds.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
